heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny skies with periods of passing clouds. Highs in the low to mid 40s in the south, and mid 30s to near 40 north. Light and variable northwest wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, then increasing clouds from the west before dawn. Temperatures will range from the low to mid-20s, dropping into the teens in the northeast, with single digits in the coldest hollows. Wind diminishing to calm.

heading: Thursday
text: Periods of morning clouds, then more sunshine developing from the west to east. Highs in the mid-30s to lows in the 40s north, increasing to low to mid-40s south. Light and variable wind.
